params._curveAddress: The address of the curve for the contract

params._tokenAddress: The key to lookup the curve with in the mapping
params._xValue: The x value to pass to the slave

returns._value: The y value of the curve

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params._curveAddress: The address of the curve for the contract

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

forceSetCurve(address,address).notice: Special function that does not calculate interest, used for deployment

getValueAt(address,int256).notice: Returns the value of curve labled _tokenAddress at _xValue

setCurve(address,address).notice: Setting a new curve should pay interest

setVaultController(address).notice: Set the VaultController addr in order to pay interest on curve setting

documentation.text:
@notice Set the VaultController addr in order to pay interest on curve setting
 @param _vaultMasterAddress The address of vault master

@notice Curve master keeps a record of CurveSlave contracts and links it with an address
 @dev All numbers should be scaled to 1e18. for instance, number 5e17 represents 50%
